refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks if multiple results are available

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: odbc_next_result returns &true; if there are more result sets available as well as allowing access to the next result set via odbc_fetch_array, odbc_fetch_row, odbc_result, etc.
The argument is a valid result identifier returned by odbc_exec.
